introText: Francophone Affairs supports Ontario's Franco-Ontarian community, promoting French-language services and preserving francophone culture and heritage across the province.
descriptionText: Francophone Affairs spent $8M in fiscal year (FY) 2023-24, representing 0.0% of the $206.6B in total provincial spending. This investment supports francophone communities and French-language services.
roleText: Ontario's francophone community is an integral part of the province's heritage and identity. This office ensures French-language services are available and supports the vitality of Franco-Ontarian communities.
programsDescription: Francophone Affairs operates programs including French-language service coordination, francophone community grants, cultural preservation initiatives, and support for Franco-Ontarian organizations.
